freeports_analysis.formats_utils.pdf_filter.pdf_parts

Pdf xml parts in a friendly format (custom python classes).

Classes

ExtractedPdfLine(blk)

A class representing a line extracted from a PDF XML structure.
class freeports_analysis.formats_utils.pdf_filter.pdf_parts.ExtractedPdfLine(blk: Element)

A class representing a line extracted from a PDF XML structure.

This class provides a friendly interface to access geometric properties, font information, and text size of a line in a PDF document.

Parametri:

blk (etree.Element) – The XML element containing the line data.

property c: Tuple[float, float]

Get the center coordinate of the line.

Ritorna:

The center coordinate (x, y) of the line.

Tipo di ritorno:

Coord

property corners: tuple

Get the corner coordinates of the line.

Ritorna:

A tuple of tuples representing the line’s corners in the format (((x_tl, y_tl), (x_tr, y_tr)), ((x_bl, y_bl), (x_br, y_br))).

Tipo di ritorno:

tuple

property font: str

Get the font used in the line.

Ritorna:

The font used in the line.

Tipo di ritorno:

Font

property geometry: Area

Get the geometric properties of the line.

Ritorna:

The area representing the line’s bounds.

Tipo di ritorno:

Area

property text_size: float

Get the text size used in the line.

Ritorna:

The text size used in the line.

Tipo di ritorno:

TextSize

property xml_blk: Element

Get the original XML element containing the line data.

Ritorna:

The original XML element containing the line data.

Tipo di ritorno:

etree.Element

Modules

font

Definition of types for identify carateristic related with typographic aspect of the line

generic

Utilities for handling generic PDF parts and components.

position

Definition of types for identify characteristic related with geometrical aspects of the line.
